content: x marks the spot chain s = chain s half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet repeat = repeat slip_stitch =slip_stitch fptr = front post triple crochet x-sts - skip st fptr around next st fptr around skipped st ch4 join with slip_stitch to first chain to form a ring round 1 ch3 counts as 1st double_crochet throughout pattern 3dc into loop *ch2 4dc into loop repeat from * to 2 more times half_double_crochet into the third chain of beginning chain to complete the round 16dc round 2 ch3 *double_crochet x-sts double_crochet double_crochet ch2 double_crochet into corner* repeat 2 more times double_crochet x-sts double_crochet double_crochet into next corner half_double_crochet into the third chain of beginning ch3 to complete the round 16dc 4x-sts round 3 ch3 double_crochet into corner * x-sts to corner 2dc ch2 2dc into corner repeat from *2 more times x- sts to corner 2dc in next corner half_double_crochet into the third chain of beginning chain to complete the round 16dc 12x-sts round 4 repeat round 3 16dc 20x-sts round 5 repeat round 3 16dc 28x-sts round 6 repeat round 3 16dc 36x-sts round 7 repeat round 3 16dc 44x-sts round 8 repeat round 3 16dc 52x-sts round 9 ch3 double_crochet into corner *double_crochet to corner 2dc ch2 2dc in corner repeat from * 2 more times double_crochet to corner 2dc in next corner ch2 slip_stitch into third chain of beginning ch3 to complete the square 136dc for a larger square or to make a blanket out of the pattern repeat round 3 to desired size then finish with round 9 - st count will vary depending on size made
